content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":114361,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹の軽い体をひょいとお姫様抱っこすると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lifting Miki's light body effortlessly in a princess carry,"},{"lineNumber":114362,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはベッドに向かう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance heads towards the bed."},{"lineNumber":114363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺達はもう大人なのだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are already adults!"},{"lineNumber":114364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほっぺにキスなんてお子ちゃまのすることよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kissing on the cheek is something only kids do!\""},{"lineNumber":114365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、美樹ちゃん、一緒に大人になるぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, Miki-chan, let's become adults together!\""},{"lineNumber":114366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うううう〜〜……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuu~~..."},{"lineNumber":114367,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなぁ、ランスくん……大人だよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh no, Lance-kun... you're an adult...\""},{"lineNumber":114368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、いっただきまーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, I’M gonna have you!\""},{"lineNumber":114369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっ、わっ、わーーー……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, wah, waahhhh...!\""},{"lineNumber":114370,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはたっぷり美樹と恋人ごっこを楽しんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance thoroughly enjoyed playing lovers with Miki."},{"lineNumber":114371,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラは戦わないからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Satera doesn't fight!\""},{"lineNumber":114372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、サテラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Satera.\""},{"lineNumber":114373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph...\""},{"lineNumber":114374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……な、なあ、ランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, Lance.\""},{"lineNumber":114376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":114377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その……お前がサテラの使徒になって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... you've become Satera's disciple,"},{"lineNumber":114378,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうしばらく経つ、な……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"and it's been a while now, right...?\""},{"lineNumber":114379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":114380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その……そろそろ呼び方を、だな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... it's about time we change how we address you...\""},{"lineNumber":114381,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ様……に、変えてもいいんだぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can change it to Lady Satera, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":114382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、いい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":114384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぐっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":114385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい、じゃない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's not fine!"},{"lineNumber":114386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいから、そう呼べ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just call me that!\""},{"lineNumber":114387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh...\""},{"lineNumber":114388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー、じゃない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No 'ehh' about it!"},{"lineNumber":114389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前はサテラの使徒だろう！","translatedEnglishLine":"You're Satera's disciple!"},{"lineNumber":114390,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主の命令に逆らう気か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you going to disobey your master’s orders?\""},{"lineNumber":114391,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別にいいではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fine either way."},{"lineNumber":114392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呼び方なんてなんだって」","translatedEnglishLine":"The way you call me doesn't really matter.\""},{"lineNumber":114393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":114394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But..."},{"lineNumber":114395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せっかく主従の関係になったのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"We finally became master and disciple..."},{"lineNumber":114396,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか……今までと変わらない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But somehow... nothing's changed from before...\""},{"lineNumber":114397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーーー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":114398,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ま、呼び方なんてなんだっていいか）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Well, I guess the way I’m called doesn’t really matter.)"},{"lineNumber":114399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、今日からサテラ様って呼んでやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright then, from today on I'll call you Lady Satera.\""},{"lineNumber":114400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!?\""},{"lineNumber":114401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いいのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-is that okay!?\""},{"lineNumber":114402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、いいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it’s fine.\""},{"lineNumber":114403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then――\""},{"lineNumber":114404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、わあ！？　馬鹿、待て！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, wah!? Idiot, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":114405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":114406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こっちにだって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I need time, too,"},{"lineNumber":114407,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心の準備というものが必要なんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"to prepare my heart!\""},{"lineNumber":114408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すうはあ、すうはあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*inhale, exhale, inhale...*"},{"lineNumber":114409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ、んっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn, nn...\""},{"lineNumber":114410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、いいぞ！　呼べ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, good! Call me!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の軽い体をひょいとお姫様抱っこすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lifting Miki's light body effortlessly in a princess carry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはベッドに向かう。
ほっぺにキスなんてお子ちゃまのすることよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kissing on the cheek is something only kids do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、美樹ちゃん、一緒に大人になるぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, Miki-chan, let's become adults together!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなぁ、ランスくん……大人だよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no, Lance-kun... you're an adult..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、いっただきまーす！」
ランスはたっぷり美樹と恋人ごっこを楽しんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance thoroughly enjoyed playing lovers with Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その……お前がサテラの使徒になって、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's been a while now, right...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その……そろそろ呼び方を、だな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... it's about time we change how we address you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様……に、変えてもいいんだぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can change it to Lady Satera, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はサテラの使徒だろう！
主の命令に逆らう気か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you going to disobey your master’s orders?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び方なんてなんだって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The way you call me doesn't really matter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せっかく主従の関係になったのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We finally became master and disciple...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか……今までと変わらない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But somehow... nothing's changed from before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、呼び方なんてなんだっていいか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Well, I guess the way I’m called doesn’t really matter.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、今日からサテラ様って呼んでやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, from today on I'll call you Lady Satera."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の準備というものが必要なんだ！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
